title: 8 Day Classic Northern Discovery
summary: Join us on a  8 day Coach Tour throuh the centre of the North Island experiencing New Zealand’s natural wonders and cultural centres, including the art deco city of Napier

title: 18 Day Classic New Zealand Panorama
summary: Travel the length of New Zealand on one of our most popular coach tour itineraries and explore one of the many different and diverse locations, including the art hub of Napier.

title: Great Glacier Explorer
summary: On this Short Break you’ll travel with a different Driver Guide and group of like-minded travellers each day, for a diverse experience through the Glacier regions of Christchurch.

title: Scenic South Island
summary: Snow capped mountains, crystal clear lakes, World Heritage National Parks and dense rainforest are some of the wonders to expect on this 9 day Escorted Tour.

title: Southern Escape
summary: Join Travelmarvel for 8 days and discover New Zealand's South Island with its stunning lakes, snow capped mountains and amazing glaciers. Highlights include visiting Mt Cook and Lake Tekapo.

title: The Alpine Adventure
summary: Learn about Christchurch’s fascinating history, iconic heritage buildings and stunning nature for a truly diverse experience through this Alpine Adventure.

title: Rotorua Discovery
summary: Take a short break, sightseeing and relaxing in Rotorua, in the cultural centre of New Zealand.

title: Marvels of the North Island
summary: Travel north to the scenic Bay of Islands, cruise to Cape Brett and the famous Hole in the Rock, visit geo-thermal geysers of Rotorua and finish in the harbour side city of Wellington.

title: Northern Explorer
summary: Discover the pristine and rugged beauty of the impressive landscapes, fascinating cultural history and delectable cuisine in our Northern Explorer tour.

title: 17 Day Highlight of New Zealand
summary: Immerse yourself in the true beauty of New Zealand on this 17 day touring experience that will see you passing from one end of the continent to the other, travelling the full length of this stunning and diverse country.

title: 8 Day Northern Highlight
summary: Experience the lush fertile hills of New Zealand’s Northern reaches on this 8 day Coach tour, taking in all the most essential and popular destinations this beautiful Island has to offer.

title: New Zealand Mosaic
summary: Travel the length of New Zealand on one of our most popular coach tour itineraries and explore one of the many different and diverse locations on our Evergreen tours.

title: New Zealand Getaway
summary: Join Travelmarvel for a 15 day affordable escorted tour exploring the scenic delights of New Zealand. Highlights include the Bay of Islands, the geothermal geysers and rich Maori culture of Rotorua and the snow capped mountains of the South Island.

title: 8 Day Taste of the North Island
summary: Explore the North Island with all inclusive packages that feature the ‘must do’ icons of New Zealand without breaking the budget.

title: New Zealand Discoverer
summary: Join Travelmarvel for a 12 day affordable tour and experience the very best of New Zealand. From the geothermal geysers and rich Maori culture of North Island to the snow capped mountains of the South.

title: North Island Unveiled
summary: Arrive at the Bay of Islands for a guided tour and visit the historic Waitangi Treaty Grounds.

title: Great Northener
summary: Join this 9 day exploration of the North Island where the geothermal activity of Rotorua and the beaches of the Bay of Islands awaits you. Experience Maori hospitality at a special Hangi feast and cultural show.

title: Bay of Islands
summary: Discover the history of the Bay of Islands with your local Maori guide and be enchanted by a cultural performance inside a traditional carved meeting house.

title: 7 Day Scenic Snapshot
summary: Immerse yourself in the stunningly diverse scenic majesty of the south Island on this 7 day tour which takes you deep into the heart of the Southern Alps and mysterious Fiordland, true highlights of any visit to New Zealand.

title: Royal New Zealand
summary: Experience authentic New Zealand, and discover unnique cultutural experiences and must-see attractions.

title: New Zealand Private Gardens and Landscapes
summary: With Botanica World Discoveries explore private gardens and nature’s garden, as well as the Taranaki Garden Spectacular, with Botanica World Discoveries. This tour provides a balanced mix of gardens and spectacular New Zealand sights and scenery
